Content: You defeated an extremely powerful enemy. The very first victory marks the bright start of your journey.
The scattered Threnodian powers have finally been collected. Outside of Tiancheng, there are people also paying a close attention to the happenings, ready to bring in the climax...
Traveling through the chaotic undercurrent, you encountered a girl named Jinxi. The famous Hierarch is calm and gentle.
Amidst the perils in the Dim Forest, an eccentric warrior came to your aid, volunteering to make up a temporary team with you.
After defeating the Tacet Discords, fluorescent lights emerged from the Hazy Depths. In the midst of this wonderful brilliance, Danjin reunited with a familiar figure.
While you are absorbing powers, the hidden hand is also taking action. Violent delights lead the story to an unpredictable ending.
